fields.name: The Lair of the Minotaur
fields.description: What respectable castle doesn't have a minotaur pit to throw meddlesome thieves into? And you might just be mistaken for one of those thieves. This is one of the earliest Eamon adventures, written by Donald Brown just after the original Beginner's Cave. It is a good example of the style of the first adventures, circa 1980.
fields.intro_text:
You had arranged to meet in the town of Dunderhaven with your friend, Larcenous Lil. When you arrived, you learned that Lil had come into town flat broke, and had tried to pick up some easy cash by burglarizing a nearby castle.

She hasn't been seen since.

Making your own subtle entrance into the castle, all seemed to be going well until suddenly the lights go on and you see yourself surrounded by bowmen and a fat, ugly man on a throne. He sneers at you and says, "Well, boys, another thief. I guess we'll send this scoundrel to meet the first."

With that, he pulls a lever, and the bottom drops out of the floor.

You slide down a long, narrow chute, with stony walls close on either side. You you land with a thud on the floor of a dark chamber.

fields.name: below the trap door. (S)
fields.description: You are at the bottom of a long shaft.  There is no way to climb back up.  The natural light is very dim here, but you can see an exit to the south.

fields.name: in a T-intersection; N and E/W.
fields.description: You are at an intersection with an east/west corridor and a north-bound passage.

fields.name: in a T-intersection; E and N/S.
fields.description: You are at an intersection with an east-bound corridor going into a north/south passage.

fields.name: in the coffin room. (S)
fields.description: You are in a small chamber with the only exit to the south.  Standing in the middle of the chamber is a coffin.

fields.name: in the stone room. (N)
fields.description: You are in a small chamber with the only exit to the north.  A large stone stands in the room and a mirror is embedded in the wall.  In the mirror you see the word "CIGAM".

fields.name: on the north beach. (S/E)
fields.description: You are on the north end of a very long beach.  To the east is a river which flows swiftly southward.

fields.name: on the middle beach. (N/S/E/W)
fields.description: You are in the middle of a long beach which runs north and south.  You cannot tell if there is anything at either end.  A tunnel leads back to the west.  To the east is a river which runs swiftly southward.

fields.name: on the south beach. (N/E)
fields.description: You are on the south end of a very long beach.  To the east is a river which flows swiftly southward.

fields.name: on the river, near the north beach. (S/W)
fields.description: You are sailing the river in your rickety old boat.  To the east is a cliff wall--Can't land there.  You may land on the north beach to the west or follow the river south.  The strong current prevents travel north.

fields.name: on the river, near the middle beach. (S/W)
fields.description: You are sailing the river in your rickety old boat.  To the west is the middle of the long beach.  The river continues south.

fields.name: on the river, near the south beach. (S/W)
fields.description: You are sailing the river in your rickety old boat.  To the west is the south end of the long beach.  If you continue taking the boat south you will go into a tunnel where you cannot make out any details.

fields.name: sailing the river, in a tunnel. (S)
fields.description: You are drifting through a tunnel, with no beaches on either side of the river to land on.  You can only continue downstream to the south.

fields.name: sailing the river, near the north grotto. (S/W)
fields.description: Cliff walls keep you from landing to the east.  To the west is a small grotto, called 'North Grotto'.  The river continues south and appears to ride next to other grottos.

fields.name: sailing the river, near the middle grotto. (S/W)
fields.description: To the west is a small grotto with a sign saying, 'Middle Grotto'.  The river continues south, going next to another grotto.

fields.name: sailing the river, near the south grotto. (S/W)
fields.description: To the west is a small grotto with a sign saying, 'South Grotto'.  The river continues south, turning into a tunnel where you cannot make out any details.

fields.name: crashing into a grate!
fields.description: As you enter the tunnel, you see light ahead.  It is coming through a grate which blocks the river.  You boat smashes into it, is destroyed, and you drown.

fields.name: in the north grotto. (E/W)
fields.description: You are in a small grotto.  To the east is a swiftly flowing river.  A tunnel leads into blackness to the west.

fields.name: in an east/west corridor.
fields.description: You are in a twisty corridor going from east to west.

fields.name: at a bend in the corridor. (S/E)
fields.description: You are at a sharp bend in the corridor, with exits leading east and south.

fields.name: in a north/south corridor.
fields.description: You are in a twisty corridor going from north to south.

fields.name: in a cross of two corridors. (N/S/E/W)
fields.description: You are at a large opening with exits in all four directions.  You see the remains of a campfire here.

fields.name: in an east/west corridor.
fields.description: You are in a twisty corridor going from east to west.

fields.name: in the middle grotto. (E/W)
fields.description: You are in a small grotto.  To the east is a swiftly flowing river.  A tunnel leads into blackness to the west.

fields.name: in a north/south corridor.
fields.description: You are in a twisty corridor going from north to south.

fields.name: at a bend in the corridor. (N/E)
fields.description: You are at a sharp bend in the corridor, with exits leading north and east.

fields.name: in an east/west corridor.
fields.description: You are in a twisty corridor going from east to west.

fields.name: in the south grotto. (E/W)
fields.description: You are in a small grotto.  To the east is a swiftly flowing river.  A tunnel leads into blackness to the west.  The ground here looks as if it has been recently dug up.

fields.name: in an east/west corridor.
fields.description: You are in a twisty corridor going from east to west.

fields.name: at a four-way intersection. (N/S/E/W)
fields.description: You are at a four-way intersection, with exits leading into darkness.  You feel a cool breeze here, but you can't tell where it is coming from.

fields.name: in a north/south corridor.
fields.description: You are in a twisty corridor going from north to south.

fields.name: in a T-intersection; S and E/W.
fields.description: You are at an intersection with an east/west corridor and a south-bound passage.

fields.name: in an east/west corridor.
fields.description: You are in a twisty corridor going from east to west.

fields.name: in the bag room. (W)
fields.description: You are in a small, featureless chamber with the only exit to the west.

fields.name: at a bend in the corridor. (N/E)
fields.description: You are at a sharp bend in the corridor, with exits leading north and east.

fields.name: in a north/south corridor.
fields.description: You are in a twisty corridor going from north to south.

fields.name: in a north/south corridor.
fields.description: You are in a twisty corridor going from north to south.

fields.name: at Witt's End. (N/S)
fields.description: A sign on the wall says, "STOP!  GO NO FURTHER!  DUNGEON UNDER CONSTRUCTION BEYOND HERE.  DANGER!  --- Witt Construction Company".

fields.name: in the insanity room.
fields.description: You are in a room designed to attack your very mind.  Exits go off in >>all<< directions, and mad scrawlings on the wall threaten to reduce you to a babbling idiot if you look at them too long.

fields.name: in a north/south corridor.
fields.description: You are in a very well-built corridor going from north to south.

fields.name: at the temple entrance. (N/S)
fields.description: To the south is a huge, open door with a sign over it reading, "Temple of Kalimar".  Scratched beside the door is the saying, "ABANDON HOPE ALL YE WHO ENTER HERE".

fields.name: at a four-way intersection. (N/S/E/W)
fields.description: You are at a four-way intersection, with very well-built tunnels going off in all four directions.

fields.name: in an east/west corridor.
fields.description: You are in a well-built corridor going from east to west.

fields.name: in the jewel room. (E)
fields.description: You are in a small room with the only exit to the east.  A stand here has written on it, "JEWEL OF MOLINAR -- DO NOT TOUCH!"

fields.name: in an east/west corridor.
fields.description: You are in a well-built corridor going from east to west.

fields.name: in the supplies room. (W)
fields.description: You are in what appears to be a storage room.  The floor is littered with odds and ends which are valueless to you.

fields.name: in a north/south corridor.
fields.description: You are in a well-built corridor going from north to south.

fields.name: at a four-way intersection. (N/S/E/W)
fields.description: You are at a four-way intersection, with very well-built tunnels going off in all four directions.

fields.name: in an east/west corridor.
fields.description: You are in a well-built corridor going from east to west.

fields.name: in the high priest's room. (E)
fields.description: You are in a bedroom garishly decorated by purple drapes and sequins (which are magically held in place and cannot be gotten).  There is a faint scent of incense in the air.

fields.name: in an east/west corridor.
fields.description: You are in a well-built corridor going from east to west.

fields.name: in the priest's treasury. (W)
fields.description: You are in what was once a treasury, with empty bags marked "FOR HOLDING GREAT TREASURE" on the floor.  They disintegrate when you try to pick them up.

fields.name: in the chapel. (N)
fields.description: You are in a huge chamber.  On the south wall stands a huge leering idol.  In the center of the room is a sacrificial altar, stained with the blood of past victims.

fields.name: in an east/west corridor.
fields.description: You are in a twisty corridor going from east to west.

fields.name: in an east/west corridor with a grate to the west.
fields.description: You are in a twisty corridor going from east to west.

fields.name: in the blacksmith's room. (N/S/E/W)
fields.description: You are in a hot and steamy blacksmith's workshop.  His tools are welded to an anvil that is too heavy to lift.

fields.name: in a north/south corridor.
fields.description: You are in a twisty corridor going from north to south.

fields.name: at a bend in the corridor. (S/W)
fields.description: You are at a sharp bend in the corridor, with exits leading south and west.

fields.name: in an east/west corridor.
fields.description: You are in a twisty corridor going from east to west.

fields.name: at a four-way intersection. (N/S/E/W)
fields.description: You are at a four-way intersection, with exits leading into darkness.

fields.name: in a north/south corridor.
fields.description: You are in a twisty corridor going from north to south.

fields.name: in a T-intersection; W and N/S.
fields.description: You are at an intersection with a north/south corridor and a west-bound passage.

fields.name: in a north/south corridor.
fields.description: You are in a twisty corridor going from north to south.

fields.name: at a four-way intersection. (N/S/E/W)
fields.description: You are still in the labyrinth, at a four-way intersection. All four exits lead into darkness.

fields.name: in an east/west corridor.
fields.description: You are in a twisty corridor going from east to west.

fields.name: at a bend in the corridor. (N/W)
fields.description: You are at a sharp bend in the corridor, with exits leading north and west.

fields.name: in a north/south corridor.
fields.description: You are in a twisty corridor going from north to south.

fields.name: in a north/south corridor.
fields.description: You are in a twisty corridor going from north to south.

fields.name: at a four-way intersection. (N/S/E/W)
fields.description: You are deep in the labyrinth. You wish you had a piece of string to mark your way. Tunnels lead north, south, east, and west into darkness.

fields.name: in an east/west corridor.
fields.description: You are in a twisty corridor going from east to west.

fields.name: in a north/south corridor.
fields.description: You are in a twisty corridor going from north to south.

fields.name: in an east/west corridor.
fields.description: You are in a twisty corridor going from east to west.

fields.name: in an east/west corridor.
fields.description: You are in a twisty corridor going from east to west.

fields.name: in an east/west corridor.
fields.description: You are in a twisty corridor going from east to west.

fields.name: in an east/west corridor.
fields.description: You are in a twisty corridor going from east to west.

fields.name: in a T-intersection; N and E/W.
fields.description: You are at an intersection with an east/west corridor and a north-bound passage.

fields.name: in a north/south corridor.
fields.description: You are in a twisty corridor going from north to south.

fields.name: in a T-intersection; E and N/S.
fields.description: You are at an intersection with a north/south corridor and a east-bound passage.

fields.name: in a north/south corridor.
fields.description: You are in a twisty corridor going from north to south.

fields.name: in a north/south corridor.
fields.description: You are in a twisty corridor going from north to south.

fields.name: in a T-intersection; E and N/S.
fields.description: You are at an intersection with a north/south corridor and a east-bound passage.

fields.name: in a north/south corridor.
fields.description: You are in a twisty corridor going from north to south.

fields.name: at a bend in the corridor. (S/E)
fields.description: You are at a sharp bend in the corridor, with exits leading east and south.

fields.name: in a rough east/west corridor.
fields.description: You are in a very rough corridor going from east to west.  it appears as if it may have been carved naturally, and a slight breeze comes from the west.

fields.name: at a bend in the corridor. (N/E)
fields.description: The rough corridor takes a sharp bend here, going north and east.

fields.name: in a rough north/south corridor.
fields.description: You are in a very rough corridor going from north to south.  It seems as if there is a slight slant of the corridor, rising up to the north!

fields.name: in a rough north/south corridor.
fields.description: You are in a very rough corridor going from north to south, with a definite rise to the north.

fields.name: in the minotaur's lair!
fields.description: You are in a large chamber, with tunnels exiting to the north and south.  The odor of minotaur droppings fills the air.

fields.name: in a rough north/south corridor.
fields.description: You are in a very rough north to south corridor that rises up to the north.

fields.name: at the tunnel entrance. (N/S)
fields.description: You are at the entrance to the tunnel, hidden from view by some bushes.  To the south is the entrance back into the caves.  To the north is a large clearing.

fields.name: in the Gypsy camp. (N/S/E/W)
fields.description: You are in a large clearing.  To the east and west is thick forest.  A road stretches off to the north.  To the south you can make out the cave entrance.

fields.name: on the road to town.  (N/S/E/W)
fields.description: The road leads south back to the Gypsy camp, and north to the Main Hall.

fields.name: in the forest.  (N/S/E/W)
fields.description: You are in a dark, thick forest.  You may walk in any direction, but you cannot be sure of where you are wandering.

fields.name: lantern
fields.description: You see a lantern here, brightly lighting the room.

fields.name: skeleton key
fields.description: You see a rusty old skeleton key here.

fields.name: boat
fields.description: You see a large, rickety boat. It is too heavy to carry, but you can use it to travel on the river.

fields.name: bottle
fields.description: You see an empty bottle here.  A label reads, "Acme Red Herring Oil".

fields.name: water
fields.description: This is plain, ordinary salt water.

fields.name: gold coins
fields.description: You see one hundred gold coins, slightly damp from the dirt.

fields.name: bag
fields.description: You see a bag here with the label, "Acme Bag Company".

fields.name: emerald
fields.description: You see a large green emerald here.

fields.name: shovel
fields.description: You see a small shovel here.

fields.name: Jewel of Molinar
fields.description: You see a jewel (possibly an opal) that glows in the darkness.

fields.name: books
fields.description: You see many ancient books.  They are written in a language you cannot read.

fields.name: silver coins
fields.description: You see 5,000 silver coins here!

fields.name: candlestick
fields.description: You see a large candlestick made out of gold and silver.

fields.name: dagger
fields.description: You see a small jeweled dagger here.  It has a bright blue gem in the handle, to contrast with the dull red stains on the blade.

fields.name: anvil
fields.description: You see a beautiful anvil here, made out of gold.  The reflections of the light from the lantern in the shine are almost hypnotic.

fields.name: coffin
fields.description: You see a huge, closed coffin here.

fields.name: iron grate
fields.description: You see the sturdy iron grate which blocks passage west.  As you study it, you notice a small key hole.

fields.name: sword
fields.description: You see a high-quality standard sword.

fields.name: mace
fields.description: You see a fair quality mace.

fields.name: morning star
fields.description: You see a glowing morning star here.

fields.name: hammer
fields.description: You see a hammer which can be used as either a metal-working tool or a war hammer.

fields.name: broad sword
fields.description: You see a nasty-looking broad sword.

fields.name: short sword
fields.description: You see a sharp short sword with your friend's initials on it.

fields.name: battle axe
fields.description: You see a huge battle axe here, with a bull's head carved into the handle.

fields.name: huge stone
fields.description: You see a huge stone here, with a hole in the top that you can neither see nor reach into.

fields.name: bound Lil
fields.description: You see your friend Larcenous Lil, chained to the altar!

fields.name: leaflet
fields.description: You see a tattered sheet of paper lying at your feet.  It looks as if every adventurer in the land has read it.

fields.name: silver key
fields.description: The priest dropped a shiny silver key with a skull-shaped handle.

fields.name: smashed skeleton
fields.description: You see the smashed bones of the un-animated skeleton.

fields.name: Killer Bunny's body
fields.description: You see the dead and soggy remains of the Killer Bunny.

fields.name: Wandering Minstrel Eye's body
fields.description: You see the old husk of the dead Wandering Minstrel Eye.

fields.name: Black Knight's body
fields.description: You see the dead body of the Black Knight.

fields.name: Priest's body
fields.description: You see the Priest's body.

fields.name: High Priest's body
fields.description: You see the High Priest's body.

fields.name: Blacksmith's body
fields.description: You see the Blacksmith's body.

fields.name: Gypsy's body
fields.description: You see the Gypsy's body.

fields.name: Larcenous Lil's body
fields.description: You see the dead body of Larcenous Lil.

fields.name: Minotaur's body
fields.description: You see the smelly dead body of the Minotaur.

fields.name: Slippery Sven's body
fields.description: You see the dead body of Slippery Sven.

fields.name: bound Sven
fields.description: You see your friend Slippery Sven, chained to the altar!

fields.text: "Welcome to The Lair of the Minotaur, a completely self-contained universe.  This was the second adventure ever written for the original Apple II Eamon system (the first being The Beginner's Cave).

"One thing most people don't know about this adventure is that your quest will vary slightly depending upon whether your character is male or female.  It's not a big change, but a pretty clever touch by the author nonetheless."
As you open the coffin, a skeleton lunges out at you!
As you touch the jewel, an electric shock runs up your arm.  You hear a voice chuckling as it says, "I told you not to touch it."
As you say the word, there is a small eruption from the center of the stone and an emerald pops out of it.

fields.name: Skeleton
fields.description: There is an animated skeleton here, who has for a weapon ten very sharp bony fingers.

fields.name: Killer Bunny
fields.description: You see swimming towards you a large rabbit with soft tan fur and a maniacal look in his pink eyes.

fields.name: Wandering Minstrel Eye
fields.description: You see floating three feet off the ground a huge disembodied eye.  It has no limbs, but from somewhere it is humming a song:  A Wandering Minstrel Eye.

fields.name: Black Knight
fields.description: You see a knight carrying a sword and outfitted in black chain mail.  He does not look friendly!

fields.name: Priest
fields.description: You see a man dressed in flowing religious garb.  He is wearing chain mail and is carrying a mace.

fields.name: High Priest
fields.description: You see a man dressed in the robes of a high priest.  He wears chain mail and has a morning star in his hand.

fields.name: Blacksmith
fields.description: You see a huge, burly man wearing the apron and gloves of a blacksmith.  He carries a hammer in his right hand that has strange red stains on it.

fields.name: Gypsy
fields.description: You see a carefree Gypsy here, playing an accordion.  His music is so lovely that you almost fail to notice the wicked broad sword lying next to him.

fields.name: Larcenous Lil
fields.description: You see your old pal, Larcenous Lil! She thanks you for freeing her. She is rubbing her wrists from where the chains cut into her skin, but she otherwise seems unharmed.

fields.name: Minotaur
fields.description: You see before you a minotaur, straight out of the legends with his bulls head, human body, and a very nasty battle axe.  He does not smell very clean.

fields.name: Slippery Sven
fields.description: You see your old pal, Slippery Sven! He thanks you for freeing him. He is rubbing his wrists from where the chains cut into his skin, but he otherwise seems unharmed.

fields.question: How do I use the boat?
How do I get past the iron grate?

fields.answer: When you try to move into the river, if the boat is nearby, you will automatically get in. When you reach the shore, you will automatically get out of the boat.
The key is located near the beginning. You can find it by opening something.
In a pinch, some doors and gates can be smashed down.
